Header: Meditation Continues to Heal Minds of Army Personnel
Content: One more phase of the Lakviru meditation project, conducted by Ven Diyasenpura Wimala Thero of the Bawunseth Meditation Centre at Helummahara, Dekatana for the benefit of 60 more Army personnel including 5 Officers got underway on Friday (3). This meditation practice programme, organized by the Directorate of Psychological Operations is aimed at promoting mental well-being and stability of Army personnel.
